column2: Alpha & Omega Semiconductor Ltd. designs, develops and supplies power semiconductor products. The company is headquartered in Sunnyvale, California and currently employs 4,338 full-time employees. The firm's portfolio of power semiconductors includes approximately 1,600 products, as of June 30, 2016. The firm's product portfolio consists of two categories: power discretes and power integrated circuits (ICs). The firm's portfolio of products focuses high-volume applications, including personal computers, flat panel televisions, light-emitting diode (LED) lighting, smart phones, battery packs, consumer and industrial motor controls and power supplies for television, computers, servers and telecommunications equipment. The firm sells its products primarily to distributors in the Asia Pacific region, who in turn sell these products to end customers. The firm conducts its operations primarily in the United States, Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, Korea and Japan. Its products are applicable in desktop and tablet personal computers, flat panel displays and televisions.
